5k Snowshoe in the Woods

Presented by: R.E.M.M. Training & Passion for Fitness LLC// Nordic Skier Wolfeboro XC

Fast and Flat 3.1 miles

TBD

Sewall Woods , Lakes Region Conservation Trust Property, Wolfeboro , New Hampshire

Come join the snowshoe fun on the beautifully groomed trails at Sewall Woods! This is a wonderful community event you wouldn't want to miss.

Race day registration: 10a - 11:30a at The Inn On Main. 200 North Main St, Wolfeboro, NH 03894, (603- 569 -1335)

Post Race Goodies

Fantastic post race goodies will be provided from many of our local businesses in Wolfeboro. Awards and raffles post race.

As a post race bonus Beveridge Craft Beer & Soap Co. will be offering a beer tasting at their shop.


51 North Main St
Wolfeboro, NH
03894
(603) 880-3013

The Inn on Main

The Inn on Main will be offering a special room rate for the weekend, $99.00. Please contact Karen Beranger directly at 603-569-1335.

Proceeds from the Race Benefit

Kingswood Regional High School XC Ski Team

Many thanks to our sponsors, and to the LRCT (Lakes Region Conservation Trust) for allowing us to have this event on their property.

For more information about donating to the Lakes Region Conservation Trust click HERE
